tags.name: kemet-popover
tags.description: Displays an element in position of a trigger. Also acts as a tooltip.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Determines whether or not the popover displays.

properties.name: effect
properties.description: The opening and closing effect of the popover. Is optional. Values include: (fade | scale | slide | fall | flip horizontal | flip vertical | sign | super scaled)

properties.name: position
properties.description: Determines the placement of the popover. Values include: (top | right | bottom | left)

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: Adds a build in tooltip to the popover.

properties.name: custom-tooltip
properties.description: Adds a custom tooltip to the popover. Use the custom-tooltip slot to specify the custom tooltip.

properties.name: fire-on-click
properties.description: Controls whether or not the tooltip triggers on click.

properties.name: fire-on-hover
properties.description: Controls whether or not the tooltip triggers on hover

slots.name: trigger
slots.description: Controls opening and closing the popover.

slots.name: custom-tooltip
slots.description: Allows you to use an svg, image, custom css, etc for a custom tooltip.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-width
cssProperties.description: The width of the popover contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-height
cssProperties.description: The height of the popover contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-color
cssProperties.description: The text color of the popover's contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-bgcolor
cssProperties.description: The background color of the popover's contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-gap
cssProperties.description: The space between the trigger and content.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-transition-speed
cssProperties.description: The speed of the opening and closing effect.

cssProperties.name: ::part(trigger)
cssProperties.description: Contains the trigger for the popover.

cssProperties.name: ::part(content)
cssProperties.description: Contains the content for the popover.

cssProperties.name: ::part(tooltip)
cssProperties.description: Contains the tooltip for the popover.

cssProperties.name: ::part(custom-tooltip)
cssProperties.description: Contains the custom tooltip for the popover.
